description: Healing Diets Coach online certification course. Professional training in food as medicine.
cleaned_text: Our comprehensive Healing Diets Online Certification Course takes you on an inspirational and experiential journey through the art and science of 'food as medicine.' diet | culinary herbs | food as medicine | self care With 12 in-depth modules, and creative, experiential and research-based assignments, students are able to integrate their newfound knowledge into highly effective practice and their own personal self healing. This course will teach you far more than you ever imagined about the use of food for healing, and will ground this knowledge through personal experience-based lessons. Learn the principles of true nutrition, and how to understand the unique needs of each individual, within the context of personal circumstances and goals. Expand into healing diets for balancing the inner ecology, cleansing and rejuvenation, longevity, life phases, beauty, emotional wellbeing, mental clarity and support for the evolution of higher consciousness. Discover how your food buying choices either support quality of life and sustainability, or damaging political and corporate agendas and, further, how myriad factors affect soil health and the environment - which in turn affects a food's nutrient density and innate healing capacity The Healing Diets Coach Online Certification Course is accredited by the AADP. Upon graduation students receive the Healing Diets Coach certification and qualify as a board accredited Holistic Health Practitioner. All students who begin with the Healing Diets Online Certification Course can also decide at a later date if they would like to continue their studies to Professional Diploma level by attending the relevant Immersion Trainings and enrolling in the Self Healing module.
